nodes.bodyText: Aren't these already auto-inferred by the enum automapper?
Apparently not? I wouldn't have mapped them if they had names in Enigma.

I looked now and they do indeed have implicit names. They didn't before. The code in Enigma from before looked like:
public static final class_4428 field_20200 = new class_4428("B", 0);
